name: That's Not How it Happened
description:
That's Not How It Happened features the same story from different points of view through different game genres. Brawl against a horde of bad guys as patriarch George.



Experience intrigue through a romance simulator as lovestruck son, Alan.



Solve a hidden puzzle mystery as daughter Zoey Turner to try to figure out how it DID happen!



  • A Beat 'em up/Dating Sim/ Point & Click comedy adventure game.
  • 4 Unique 2D art styles that represent each character's wacky perspective!
  • Fully voiced, including maybe a talking dinosaur.
  • Sandwich.
